alert.note: Alert for Brule; Charles Mix; Gregory (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 08 at 1:57AM MST until February 08 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Brule, Gregory and Charles Mix Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Yankton Sioux Tribal Nation. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Warm and dry conditions combined with the strong winds will result in extreme fire danger. A Red Flag Warning has also been issued.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
